狘字的基本解释

狘
xuè
（兽）惊跑。
古书上说的一种兽。

狘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuè］
［《廣韻》許月切，入月，曉。］
兽疾走貌。

狘字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狘； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页709第13
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?許月切，音䬂。【說文】獸走貌。【禮·禮運】麟以爲畜，故獸不狘。【註】狘，走貌也。【疏】狘，驚走也。【釋文】况越反。　又【廣韻】獸名。○按《說文》本作?。《正字通》云：俗本《說文》譌从戌，非。

狘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
狘字的起名意思

兽疾走貌。

Stubborn
Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
xuè
(Beast) Startled.
A kind of beast said in ancient books.
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuè］
["Guang Yun" Xu Yue cuts, enters the moon, dawn. ]
The beast walks quickly.
Stubborn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　狘; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 709 13
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Xu Yueqie, sound. [Said the text] The beast looks away. 【Rite·Rite Fortune】Lin thinks of animals, so beasts are not crippled. [Note] You can also look away. 【Sparse】You are scared and go away. 【Explanation】The situation is getting worse.　[Guangyun] The name of the beast. ○According to "Said Wen" this work?. "Zhengzitong" says: The popular version of "Shuowen" Jiao Congxu, non.
